item.title: Rara avis (infrequent flyer)
item.description: For the last twelve years I have had a notice posted here asking to hear from other academics who have substantially reduced their flying or are keen to do so, and from anyone with information on practical alternatives to academic travel, e.g. high-quality video-conferencing. As I update the page in January 2021, the situation has changed almost beyond recognition. Because of Coronavirus, academic travel has largely ceased. And we have learnt a lot about holding travel-free academic meetings through remote links.
